aside.p1: The aside element defines some content aside from the content it is placed in (like a sidebar).
aside.p2: The aside content should be related to the surrounding content.

sections.p: The section element defines a section in a document.

articles.p: The article element specifies independent, self-contained content.
An article should make sense on its own, and it should be possible to read it independently from the rest of the web site.

sections.p: A section is a thematic grouping of content, typically with a heading.

articles.p: Examples of where an article element can be used are forum post, blog post, newspaper article
Section elements can contain article elements, and article elements can contain section elements.
